translations: v.冒犯；令人不适；犯罪；违反（常规）（offend 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Allen back-pedalled, saying that he had had no intention of offending them.
sentences.translation: 爱伦改变了立场，表示他没有冒犯他们的意思。

sentences.sentence: They want to avoid offending any of their audience.
sentences.translation: 他们想避免冒犯任何观众。

sentences.sentence: He started offending at the age of 16.
